message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure will bring you significant value. I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1500000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to be mindful of my budget.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is a fair price considering the value I believe the product will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $1200000, but I think I can do better than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1250000. Can you meet me in the middle on this one?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1300000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not sure I can meet you at $1300000. I'm willing to pay $1250000, and I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $1275000, which is the absolute minimum I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're trying to get a good price, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with $1275000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1250000 and $1275000, which would be $1262500. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to meet you at $1262500, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1300000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
